description: Detects URP patterns and status codes that indicate a successful ProxyShell exploitation attack against Exchange servers
author: Florian Roth
Rich Warren
name: Successful Exchange ProxyShell Attack
query: (cs-uri-query:*\/autodiscover.json* AND cs-uri-query:(*\/powershell* OR *\/mapi\/nspi* OR *\/EWS* OR *X\-Rps\-CAT*) AND http.response.status_code:("200" OR "301"))
